quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: Greatness begins beyond your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: Continuous effort – not strength or intelligence – is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: If you can dream it. you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, it’s the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Kites rise highest against the wind – not with it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: The biggest mistake people make in life is NOT making a living at doing what they most enjoy.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.text: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life – think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one’s aim.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: The only people who don’t make mistakes are those who do nothing, and that is the biggest mistake of all.
quotes.author: Dr William Reilly

quotes.text: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Success is the child of audacity.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
quotes.author: John Assaraf

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Nothing happens unless first a dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Dream is not the thing you see in sleep but is that thing that doesn’t let you sleep.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. If you can’t walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: You can be discouraged by failure or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can because that’s where you will find success, on the other side of failure.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.text: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing you can do is keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals – that is, goals that do not inspire them.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

quotes.text: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.text: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know, the more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The difference between where you are today and where you’ll be five years from now will be found in the quality of books you’ve read.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: The important thing is that we must be constantly moving forward – yes, the progress realization of a predetermined goal. And our growth should never end.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Men who know exactly what they want of life, and are determined to get it, do not stop with wishing. They intensify their wishes into a burning desire, and back that desire with continuous effort based on a sound plan.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The moment a man ceases to progress, to grow higher, wider and deeper, then his life becomes stagnant.
quotes.author: Orison S. Marden

quotes.text: Discontent is the first necessity of progress.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale
